name: Stasher Reusable Stand Up Bag
description: Plastic bags are convenient for you, but not great for the planet and its ocean life. This reusable bag seals easily, with a large bottom so it won't fall over on your table.Food grade silicone is easy to clean and won't transfer taste.Airtight pinch and press seal keeps food fresh.Dimensions: 18 x 22 x 9cmTop-rack dishwasher safe.Sous-vide friendly.
